resources.string: Device is already registered on server.

From Demo Server: successfully removed device!

Could not unregister device on Demo Server (%1$s).

"This app is now open source!
" " You can find more info at http://junkcode.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=3. Feel free to browse the code and/or propose or even implement new features.
" "
" "App is still also in beta and you can contact us with any ideas on: 
" " - forum http://junkcode.net/forum/ 
" " - or bug tracker at https://github.com/JunkCode/RemoteSilencer/issues 
" "
"
"Do you like this app? Say it by donation on http://junkcode.net for future development.\r\n"

"Version: 1.10
" " - New update of google services (unfortunately new pairing is required).
" " - Widgets now have feedback on local mute/unmute changes.
" " - The app is now open source! http://junkcode.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=3 
"
